medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the type and function of the message and to transmit its identifying number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify the date and, when required, the time at which the message has been created as well as specification of other process dates.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to give auxiliary references and the relevant dates for the message itself.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to give another reference for the message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to give the period reported in the message (for example day/month/year).

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to give the identification of the reporting agent (generally the bank) or, possibly with a second occurrence, the identification of the bank on behalf of which the declaration is made.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the resident bank.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or a department for the party specified in the NAD segment and to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to give a communication number for the party identified in the NAD segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to accommodate the details relevant to the transactions performed in one currency.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, A segment identifying the report line item by a current line number.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to give the opening balance and the closing balance of the account and the currency.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to give for each currency the relevant information.

medi:segment.name: Requirements and conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, A segment to give the nature of transaction or the type of position. A qualifier allows a clear distinction.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to give information in clear and free form to provide explanations about the nature of the transaction or about the position.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to give the amount and details of each different nature of the transaction or the amount and details related to the position.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to give the amount, and if necessary the currency, of the transaction or of the position.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to give the identification and the quantity of security.

medi:segment.name: Related identification numbers
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIR, A segment to identify the type of security (shares, bonds, etc).

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify the quantity of security.

medi:segment.name: Price details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRI, A segment to give the face value of the security.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments to give the references and dates of the transaction.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to give the serial number of the transaction.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to give the day, month and year of the transaction.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to give the identification of 2nd party (either the Payor, the Payee or another party). A second occurrence allows the identification of a 3rd party.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate one of the different countries involved.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments to specify the details of authentication.

medi:segment.name: Authentication result
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AUT, A segment to specify the details of any authentication (validation) procedure applied to the BOPBNK message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify the date and if necessary, the time of validation.
